text: @RobertJenrick @Johnrashton47 When his wife was ill that Friday morning with what he suspected was Covid-19 he returned to work that afternoon clearly putting his colleagues at risk. He then drove 260 miles to Durham that night breaking the rule "stay in your primary residence." Indefensible behaviour.
